title: Living in the Light: A Guide to Personal and Planetary Transformation
description: In Living in the Light, Shakti Gawain introduced a powerful new way of that of listening to one's own intuition and relying on it as a guiding force. In the newly revised edition of that classic work, she elaborates on her original ideas, adding aspects of her own experiences and learning process over the past twelve years. In addition to balancing feminine and masculine energies, she now examines several other fundamental polarities we all have, such as power and vulnerability. Everyone's life journey involves developing the full range of self and acknowledging all aspects of one's personality â€” including both light facets and dark.
author: Shakti Gawain
